Landamrks.name: SilverOak Estate
Landamrks.description: Silver Oak Estate, located in Kolkata, is a luxurious residential complex known for its elegant architecture, lush greenery, and modern amenities.

Landamrks.name: City Center II
Landamrks.description: City Centre II is a shopping mall and lifestyle destination located in Rajarhat, a part of the New Town area of Kolkata, known for its INOX multiplex and various cafes, ice-cream parlors.

Landamrks.name: Eco Park
Landamrks.description: Eco Tourism Park, located in Kolkata, India, is a vast urban park spanning over 475 acres. It features themed gardens, water bodies, cycling tracks, and eco-friendly attractions.

Landamrks.name: NSCB International Airport
Landamrks.description: Kolkata's primary airport, offering domestic and international flights, ensuring convenient travel for business and leisure.

Landamrks.name: Biswa Bangla Gate
Landamrks.description: Biswa Bangla Gate, Kolkata's iconic skywalk, offers panoramic city views. This architectural marvel features a glass-enclosed gallery.

Landamrks.name: Salt Lake Stadium
Landamrks.description: Salt Lake Stadium, Kolkata, is a historic sports venue known for hosting football matches and other events. With a seating capacity of over 85,000, it is one of the largest stadiums in India.
